eng.vasPouzdanDomacin: North your montenegro - Your trustworthy host
eng.kontaktirajteNasTekst: Contact us, and we will respond as soon as possible.

dzipSafari.opis: 4x4 field trips led by our professional guides and allow you to walk through the untouched part of nature. Join exciting rides in the mountains.

biking.opis: We have carefully designed a large number of cycling tours that will allow you to see the natural beauties from all angles.

hiking.opis: Hike with us and explore all the beauties of our country.

kanjoning.opis: With this adventurous activity you will have the opportunity to climb down into the canyons of rivers that have been grinding for thousands of years.

rafting.opis: Rafting on wild rivers along with a variety of multi-day activities and socializing. As one of the most popular types of active holidays, rafting is the perfect combination of adrenaline enjoying and relaxing in nature.

cg.vasPouzdanDomacin: North your montenegro - Vaš pouzdan domacin
cg.kontaktirajteNasTekst: Kontaktirajte nas, a mi ćemo odgovoriti u najkraćem roku.

dzipSafari.opis: 4x4 terenske ture koje vode naši profesionalni vodiči i omogućavaju vam da prodjete kroz netaknuti dio prirode. Prudruzite se uzbudljivim vožnjama planinskim prostranstvima.

biking.opis: Pažljivo smo osmislili veliki broj biciklistih tura koje će vam omogućiti da vidite prirodne ljepote iz svih uglova.

hiking.opis: Pješačite sa nama i istražite sve ljepote naše zemlje.

kanjoning.opis: Uz ovu avanturističku aktivnost imaćete priliku da se spuštate u kanjonima rijeka koji su hiljadama godina brusili.

rafting.opis: Splavarite na divljim rijekama uz razne višednevne aktivnosti i druženja. Kao jedan od najpopularnijih vidova aktivnog odmora, rafting je savršena kombinacija adrenalinskog uživanja i odmaranja u prirodi.
